overview: With humor, prolific director VÃ­ctor Matellano tells the story of one of the most iconic and problematic cult films of Spain's "fantaterror": Los resucitados by Arturo de Bobadilla. A story of ambition, frustration and the everlasting will of the most passionate cinephiles.
tagline: For 23 years, he has been trying to make a cursed movie... Now, a monster follows him.
title: Mi adorado Monster
